advmapshading.description: Set or toggle advanced map shading mode

advmodelshading.description: Set or toggle advanced model shading mode

aicontrol.description: Creates a new instance of a Skirmish AI, to let it control a specific team

aikill.description: Kills the Skirmish AI controlling a specified team

ailist.description: Prints a list of all currently active Skirmish AIs

aireload.description: Reloads the Skirmish AI controlling a specified team

airmesh.description: Show/Hide the smooth air-mesh map overlay

allmapmarks.description: Show/Hide all map marks drawn so far

ally.description: Starts/Ends alliance of the local player's ally-team with another ally-team

atm.description: Redirects command /ATM to its synced processor

buffertext.description: Write the argument string(s) directly to the console history

chat.description: Starts waiting for intput to be sent to

chatall.description: Starts waiting for intput to be sent to All

chatally.description: Starts waiting for intput to be sent to Ally

chatspec.description: Starts waiting for intput to be sent to Spec

clearmapmarks.description: Remove all map marks drawn so far

clock.description: Shows a small digital clock indicating the local time

commandhelp.description: Prints info about a specific chat command

commandlist.description: Prints all the available chat commands with description (if available) to the console

crash.description: Invoke an artificial crash through a NULL-pointer dereference (SIGSEGV)

createvideo.description: Start/Stop capturing a video of the game in progress

cross.description: Allows one to exchange and modify the appearance of the cross/mouse-pointer in first-person-control view

debugcubemap.description: Use debug cubemap texture instead of the sky

debuginfo.description: Print debug info to the chat/log-file about either sound, profiling, or command-descriptions

decguiopacity.description: Decreases the the opacity(see-through-ness) of GUI elements

decreaseviewradius.description: Decrease the view radius (higher performance, uglier view)

destroy.description: Destroys one or multiple units by unit-ID, instantly

desync.description: Redirects command /Desync to its synced processor

disticon.description: Set the distance between units and camera, at which they turn into icons (Graphic setting)

distsortprojectiles.description: Enable/Disable sorting drawn projectiles by camera distance

divbyzero.description: Invoke an artificial crash by performing a division-by-zero

drawlabel.description: Draws a label on the map at the current mouse-pointer position

dumpshadows.description: Save shadow map textures to files

echo.description: Write a string to the log file

endgraph.description: Enables/Disables the statistics graphs shown at the end of the game

exception.description: Invoke an artificial crash by throwing an std::runtime_error

fpshud.description: Enables/Disables HUD (GUI interface) shown in first-person-control mode

give.description: Places one or multiple units of a single or multiple types on the map, instantly; by default to your own team

grabinput.description: Prevents/Enables the mouse from leaving the game window (windowed mode only)

grounddetail.description: Set the level of ground detail

group.description: Allows modifying the members of a group

group0.description: Allows modifying the members of group 0

group1.description: Allows modifying the members of group 1

group2.description: Allows modifying the members of group 2

group3.description: Allows modifying the members of group 3

group4.description: Allows modifying the members of group 4

group5.description: Allows modifying the members of group 5

group6.description: Allows modifying the members of group 6

group7.description: Allows modifying the members of group 7

group8.description: Allows modifying the members of group 8

group9.description: Allows modifying the members of group 9

iconfadestart.description: Set the distance where unit icons became completely opaque at

iconfadevanish.description: Set the distance where unit icons fade out at

iconsasui.description: Set whether unit icons are drawn as an UI element (true) or old LOD-like style (false, default).

iconscaleui.description: Set the multiplier for the size of the UI unit icons

iconshidewithui.description: Set whether unit icons are hidden when UI is hidden.

incguiopacity.description: Increases the the opacity(see-through-ness) of GUI elements

inputtextgeo.description: Move and/or resize the input-text field (the "Say: " thing)

lastmsgpos.description: Moves the camera to show the position of the last message

lodscale.description: Set the scale for either of: LOD (level-of-detail), shadow-LOD, reflection-LOD, refraction-LOD

luagaia.description: Redirects command /LuaGaia to its synced processor

luagccontrol.description: Toggle between 1/f and 30/s Lua garbage collection rate

luamenu.description: Allows one to reload or disable LuaMenu, or alternatively to send a chat message to LuaMenu

luarules.description: Redirects command /LuaRules to its synced processor

luasave.description: Save the game state to a specific file, add -y to overwrite when file is already present

luaui.description: Allows one to reload or disable LuaUI, or alternatively to send a chat message to LuaUI

maxnanoparticles.description: Set the maximum number of nano-particles (Graphic setting)

maxparticles.description: Set the maximum number of particles (Graphics setting)

moveback.description: Moves the camera Back a bit

movedown.description: Moves the camera Down a bit

movefast.description: Moves the camera Fast a bit

moveforward.description: Moves the camera Forward a bit

moveleft.description: Moves the camera Left a bit

movereset.description: Moves the camera Reset a bit

moveright.description: Moves the camera Right a bit

moverotate.description: Moves the camera Rotate a bit

moveslow.description: Moves the camera Slow a bit

movetilt.description: Moves the camera Tilt a bit

moveup.description: Moves the camera Up a bit

netmsgsmoothing.description: Toggles whether client will use net-message smoothing; better for unstable connections

netping.description: Send a ping request to the server

noluadraw.description: Allow/Disallow Lua to draw on the map

pastetext.description: Paste either the argument string(s) or the content of the clip-board to chat input

quitmenu.description: Opens the quit-menu, if it is not already open

quitmessage.description: Deprecated, see /Quit instead (was used to quit the game immediately)

resbar.description: Shows/Hides team resource storage indicator bar

resync.description: Redirects command /Resync to its synced processor

save.description: Save the game state to a specific file, add -y to overwrite when file is already present

screenshot.description: Take a screen-shot of the current view

send.description: Send a string as raw network message to the game host (for debugging only)

setspeed.description: Set the simulation speed to any positive value, bounded by the minimum and maximum game speed settings.

shadows.description: Disables/Enables shadows rendering: -1=disabled, 0=off, 1=full shadows, 2=skip terrain shadows

sharedialog.description: Opens the share dialog for sending units and resources to other players

showelevation.description: Enable rendering of the auxiliary height-map overlay

showmetalmap.description: Enable rendering of the auxiliary metal-map overlay

showpathcost.description: Enable rendering of the path cost-map overlay

showpathflow.description: Enable/Disable rendering of the path flow-map overlay

showpathheat.description: Enable/Disable rendering of the path heat-map overlay

showpathtraversability.description: Enable rendering of the path traversability-map overlay

showpathtype.description: Shows path traversability for a given MoveDefName, MoveDefID or UnitDefName

showstandard.description: Disable rendering of all auxiliary map overlays

slowdown.description: Decreases the simulation speed. The engine will try to simulate less frames per second

soundchannelenable.description: Enable/Disable specific sound channels: UnitReply, General, Battle, UserInterface, Music

sounddevice.description: Switch the sound output system (currently only OpenAL / NullAudio)

specfullview.description: Sets or toggles between full LOS or ally-team LOS if the local user is a spectator

spectator.description: Lets the local user give up control over a team and start spectating

specteam.description: Lets the local user specify the team to follow if he is a spectator

speedcontrol.description: Sets how server adjusts speed according to player's CPU load, 1: use average, 0: use highest

speedup.description: Increases the simulation speed. The engine will try to simulate more frames per second

take.description: Redirects command /Take to its synced processor

team.description: Lets the local user change to another team

togglelos.description: Enable rendering of the auxiliary LOS-map overlay

tooltip.description: Enables/Disables the general tool-tips, displayed when hovering over units. features or the map

track.description: Start/stop following the selected unit(s) with the camera

trackmode.description: Shift through different ways of following selected unit(s)

tset.description: Set a config key=value pair in the overlay, meaning it will not be persisted for future games

viewselection.description: Moves the camera to the center of the currently selected units

w.description: Say something in private to a specific player, by player-name

wbynum.description: Say something in private to a specific player, by player-ID

wiremap.description: Toggle wireframe-mode drawing of map geometry

wiremodel.description: Toggle wireframe-mode drawing of model geometry

wiresky.description: Toggle wireframe-mode drawing of skydome geometry

wirewater.description: Toggle wireframe-mode drawing of water geometry
